description:
Estimate fwhm smoothness of a volume.

Estimates the smoothness of the input volume in X, Y, and Z directions separately, printing the estimates to standard output, in mm as FWHM.  If -subvolume or -whole-file are not specified, each subvolume is estimated and displayed separately.

opt_roi_roivol.title: opt_roi_roivol
opt_roi_roivol.description: use only data within an ROI: the volume to use as an ROI

opt_subvolume_subvol.title: opt_subvolume_subvol
opt_subvolume_subvol.description: select a single subvolume to estimate smoothness of: the subvolume number or name

opt_demean.title: opt_demean
opt_demean.description: subtract the mean image before estimating smoothness

anyOf.description: estimate for the whole file at once, not each subvolume separately

whole_file.description: estimate for the whole file at once, not each subvolume separately
